title: Should i get Ekko or Lee sin??

replies.body: ive heard that ekko can be a good jungler. is this so?
If you can play a good Lee Sin you will have a lot of fun, Although Ekko can get quite boring IMO

Id get ekko, he is more interesting, has a cooler/cleaner model/animations, more quotes, and pretty interesting lore.
lee sin is just the go-to pick for people who want to win, his model is so outdated, almost as much as his ability animations/particles. Most lee sin players don't even know his lore, because it isn't very good anyway.

if you care about only succeeding then pick lee and if you care about succeeding but also everything else then pick ekko.

plus pick ekko cos we don't want any more lee's running around theres already too many.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=0VrEt5Rt,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-16T11:14:40.369+0000)

> if you care about only succeeding then pick lee and if you care about succeeding but also everything else then pick ekko.
 
don't think so, ekko's kit is perfect for ganking jungling and laning who has outstanding scaling potential where lee will generally fall off past 20 minutes

but on the case of which is more fun, im tied, i really do love both champs which both have in depth mechanical prowess
Don't submit to the common plebbery of these champions' respective playerbases, but if your heart is absolutely completely and utterly set on one of them then go with Ekko.

ooh mixed comments here
anyways thanks guys for the answers
I think i will go for lee sin since he is more "complex" and that when u play him good hes op anyways 
{{champion:64}} i knew i should trust the asian xD

If you want a challenge then pick lee sin as he is some what "difficult" to learn but ends up being extremely op if you can play him well. Ekko on the other hand is much easier and at his current state his kit is a bit overpowered. I find myself getting him on random in aram when he's free and carrying the game heavily despite having very little experience with him at all. I would still buy lee sin if it was me since I actually own him and enjoy playing him time to time. I also get that feeling when I kill someone that it was "fair" and not "I won that fight because my champ is op" like I get when playing ekko. Anyways it's up to you but either way enjoy playing league! :D

Honestly Ekko isn't OP, his just got a rather simple kit and a lot of trading power.

Lee is more "complex"

It's a quote because even a shit lee can do good because his numbers are still stupid, but koreans complain so rito won't nerf him.

Basically depends on what you favor

Lee sin has better early game, Ekko scales better in the late game.
